title: Extra Virgin Olive Oil Tasting & Workshop
desc:
As part of our Gourmet Experiences Series, you will be introduced to the exciting and mysterious world of olive oil. During this workshop, we will delve into the culture of olive oil, its health benefits, quality, production and procurement processes, how to buy olive oil, and lastly, the practice and methodology of olive oil tasting. 
 Image: Restaurant Alcal?
